page.title: 13Industrial Technology
page.content: The Risley Employment Area and the Birchwood Science Park have the most modern factories dealing with the new technology so typical of the l980s. Covering over 82 hectares the area houses the United Kingdom Atomic Energy Authority and British Nuclear Fuels. The Genesis Centre is the base for firms dealing with electronic products,computors, data terminals, ultrasonic probes,robotic equipment, environmental analysis and bio-medical equipment to name a few. The first factory,Engineering Polymers,opened in 1975. An Adult Training Centre opened in November 1982.The Birchwood Science Boulevard is now almost complete.
